description: Warren Gatland says he and his Wales coaching team are 'well aware' of the pressures heading into this year's Six Nations.
title: Warren Gatland 'well aware' of pressures heading into Six Nations
title_page: Warren Gatland 'well aware' of pressures heading into Six Nations - BBC Sport
maintext:
Warren Gatland says he and his Wales coaching team are 'well aware' of the pressures heading into this year's Six Nations.
Gatland has been challenged by Welsh Rugby Union chief executive Abi Tierney to 'lead Wales to success' at this year's tournament.
It follows a review into the autumn campaign in which Wales rounded out a calendar year without a Test victory.
Wales open their Six Nations campaign way to France on 31 January.
